 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפְתָּן‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==threshold== (compare Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּתִין‎</span> ***cross-beam***; ? Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***carpenter***;); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[1Sam.5.4|1Sam 5:4]]; [[Zeph.1.9|Zeph 1:9]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפְתַּן דָּגוֺן‎</span> [[1Sam.5.5|1Sam 5:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַבַּיִת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[Ezek.9.3|Ezek 9:3]]; [[Ezek.10.4|Ezek 10:4]]; [[Ezek.10.18|Ezek 10:18]]; [[Ezek.47.1|Ezek 47:1]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשַּׁצר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[Ezek.46.2|Ezek 46:2]].
